name: Kieon
tag_list: web-development, offshore-development, website, offshore, social-media, rich-media, -net, php, flash
overview:
Kieon is one of the most experienced web development and maintenance companies in the digital media sector. Partnering mainly with advertising and communications agencies, Kieon’s end clients include companies and organisations ranging from governments and educational establishments to banks, insurance firms and global consumer brands.

Kieon’s focus enables a deep understanding of the demands of digital media. Based between Moorgate in London and a dedicated 10,000 sq. ft. development centre in Central Bangalore, Kieon is a Microsoft certified partner and boasts a nearly 100 strong team, also highly skilled in PHP, front-end HTML, apps and rich media development.

Kieon’s experience ranges from building HTML email campaigns and microsites to large multi-lingual corporate websites, secure intranets and global e-commerce sites, using multiple technologies from WordPress to SharePoint.

Kieon’s continued success lies in combining highly skilled developers with locally integrated key account and project management to provide high quality yet cost-effective website development and maintenance services.
